description:
Allows users to see their upcoming and active deliveries, or add new deliveries directly to Parcel via MCP

(Requires Parcel Premium)

parcelApiKey.description: Your Parcel API key from web.parcelapp.net

tools.name: add_delivery
tools.description: Add a new delivery to Parcel for tracking

carrier_code.description: Carrier code (e.g., 'ups', 'fedex', 'usps', 'pholder' for placeholder). See supported_carriers.json for full list

send_push_confirmation.description: Set to true to receive a push notification when delivery is added. Default: false

tools.name: get_deliveries
tools.description: Get your recent or active deliveries from Parcel

filter_mode.description: Filter mode: 'active' for active deliveries, 'recent' for recent ones. Default: 'recent'

tools.name: get_supported_carriers
tools.description: Get the list of supported carriers and their codes

tools.name: get_delivery_status_codes
tools.description: Get the meaning of delivery status codes
